H0.text: Wayne Rooney scored his first senior goal against which club. Everton

H1.text: Wayne Rooney scored his first senior goal against which club. Manchester United

H2.text: Wayne Rooney scored his first senior goal against which club. Liverpool

H3.text: Wayne Rooney scored his first senior goal against which club. Arsenal

A4.text: He scored his first senior goal in a 3–1 friendly victory over SC Weiz on 15 July.
